messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] ~ Unschooling Voices-add your voice! ~
messages.msgSnippet:
I added it to my blog :)  I look forward to reading and being involved.  I
like that you throw out a topic for us... sometimes I need something to go
on. Lesa
messages.messageBody:
I added it to my blog :) I look forward to reading and being involved. I
like that you throw out a topic for us... sometimes I need something to go
on.

Lesa McMahon
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net
http://stoptherod.net/
http://parentinginjesusfootsteps.org/

"Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth."
-John F. Kennedy

-------Original Message-------

From: Joanne
Date: 06/11/06 16:21:29
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] ~ Unschooling Voices-add your voice! ~

:-) I'm so happy reviving the unschooling carnival got such a good
response and that all of you want to see it happen, as I do. It's going
to be great!

The first one will be out on July 1st. I put together a web page with
all the details. Here's the link:
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

I think I covered everything on it, but if you have a question, just
holler. Being this is a new, I'm kinda thinking as I go along so
please bear with me if I don't have all the details worked out yet. :-)

If you can blog, post or add this to your website, that would be a big
help in getting the word out. I'll be posting this in several places so
I apologise if you see it more than once.

I think this is going to be fun for all of us and I am looking forward
to reading all of your posts. :-)

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
